Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [F#m]Why do I [D]doubt You Lord, you are [A]faithful [E] [F#m]You have [D]supplied my every [A]need [E] [F#m]You laid Your [D]life down for me [A]Jesus [E] [F#m]I lay my [D]life down for You [A E]
CHORUS: You’re so [F#m7]good, You’re so good You’re so [D]good, You’re so good Yes You [A]are, You are good, so [Esus]good to [E]me
VERSE 2: [F#m7]Oh why this [D]downcast soul in my [A]suff’ring [E] [F#m7]These hard things [D]are your loving [A]plan [E] [F#m]You’re making [D]me more like you, [A]Jesus [E] [F#m]I will com[D]pletely trust you [A E]
VERSE 3: [F#m]By grace I [D]place my hope in Your [A]promise [E] [F#m]Soon one day [D]You will call me [A]home [E] [F#m]There at last [D]I will see You [A]Jesus [E] [F#m]And throw my [D]arms around You [A E]
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 why do i doubt you lord you are faithful you have supplied my every need you laid your life down for me jesus i lay my life down for you chorus youre so good youre so good youre so good youre so good yes you are you are good so good to me verse 2 oh why this downcast soul in my suffring these hard things are your loving plan youre making me more like you jesus i will completely trust you verse 3 by grace i place my hope in your promise soon one day you will call me home there at last i will see you jesus and throw my arms around you
